content: quote: A Russian antisubmarine warship participating in military exercises in the Gulf of Finland accidentally fired a salvo of missiles into the village of Pesochnoye, near St. Petersburg. Russian news agencies cited a Russian Navy spokesman as saying that a total of 10 missiles were accidentally fired at the village. Remarkably nobody was injured and the only damage was a broken car window. Some terrified villagers said they thought a war had started, Russia's Ria Novosti news agency reports. I wonder if villagers will sue the RN for “extreme emotional disturbance”. +http://www.rferl.org/Content/Russian_Warship_Attacks_Russian_Village/1742463.html "None are more hopelessly enslaved than those who falsely believe they are free." -Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

title: Shell shock for Russian village
